description: This apartment is located very close to the railway station and a few steps away from Vevekananda Kendra and New Tiruppathi. It's a 800 sq.ft well maintained apartment and have large bed rooms and living room space. WiFi, air conditioners, refrigerator & parking facilities available. Public transportation are within walking distance.

description: A quiet room with fan and private bathroom overlooking the sea, the mountains and the sunset! A few minutes walk from secluded beach cove. Stella Maris is an NGO, and all funds received through the the rooms go to various social projects. We also speak French, Italian, Tamil, Malayalam, Arabic and Irish

description: Its a cozy apartment located in nagercoil, kanniyakumari district, you wouldnt feel the hustle and bustle of the city thereby giving your much needed vacation a quite moment. The place is spacious and has a good ambiance to it. Make yourself at home by cooking your favourite meal or just relaxing with a book or all the better by catching up with your family and friends.
